channel.title: CVE Feed for User Activation Email -- User Activation Email
channel.description: The latest CVEs for User Activation Email -- User Activation Email

item.title: CVE-2021-38325|2024-09-16T19:34:57.456Z -- user%20activation%20email -- user%20activation%20email
item.description: The User Activation Email WordPress plugin is vulnerable to Reflected Cross-Site Scripting via the uae-key parameter found in the ~/user-activation-email.php file which allows attackers to inject arbitrary web scripts, in versions up to and including 1.3.0.
